content: times bind off leaving about 8 of yarn the works should naturally have a bit of a curl to it arrange the spirals so that there is a nice rose shape using the yarn tail sew the based of the rose to keep it s shape weave in ends add a button if you choose and attach to the dress ____________________________________________________________________________________________ page 12 of 12 unique crochet & knitting designs by theresa knapp ©2016 please do not reproduce change share or sell images or patterns
